title: What is a living organism known as? - Quora

response.answer_text: A living organism. Or just organism works too, you can’t have a non-living organism. You can’t say cell because there are multicellular organisms. You can’t name any of the classifications of life because that would not include all living organisms. So living organism or just organism is all I can think of. Or maybe “life”? I don’t think that works, since it refers to life as a whole not any individual organisms.
